Description:
*The roadmap item is no longer accurate. We will publish an update in the future. Users of Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat can easily return to their recent chats and organize their work in Microsoft Copilot. With the new pinned chats feature, they can pin up to 15 chats for easy access later.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: May CY2024
Title: Microsoft Copilot: Pinned chats
